message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $10,000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it provides, I would like to propose a price of $9,500 for this exclusive item. This offer is designed to provide you with significant value while allowing us to maintain a fair profit margin. I believe this price point will be beneficial for both parties and help us establish a long-term relationship based on mutual trust and satisfaction. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
